title: Which of the following statement best define Vue.js?
answer_1: Vue.js an open-source JavaScript library that is used for developing user interfaces.
answer_2: Vue.js an open-source Front-end JavaScript framework used for developing user interfaces.
answer_3: Vue.js is a JavaScript library constructed to facilitate HTML DOM tree traversal and administration, event handling, CSS activity, and Ajax
correct_answer: Vue.js an open-source Front-end JavaScript framework used for developing user interfaces.

title: Why is Vue.js called a progressive framework?
answer_1: Vue.js called a progressive framework because it is being changed and developed continually.
answer_2: Vue.js is called a progressive framework because it facilitates us to create Dynamic User Interfaces and single-page applications.
correct_answer: Vue.js called a progressive framework because it is being changed and developed continually.

title: What is the main usage of Vue.js?
answer_1: Vue.js is a dynamic JavaScript framework that is frequently used for developing user interfaces.
answer_2: Vue.js is a JavaScript library that makes user interfaces for single-page applications by dividing UI into components.
answer_3: Vue.js uses the MVVM pattern to bind data to certain DOM elements.
correct_answer: Vue.js is a dynamic JavaScript framework that is frequently used for developing user interfaces.
